title: Select the suitable options for you to attend the hearing.
subtitle: The type of oral hearing will be at the discretion of the tribunal.
instructions: Please select all the suitable options for you to take part in the hearing.

error.required: You need to provide an option for you to attend the hearing.

requested.label: Telephone (you'll need somewhere quiet and private to speak). Please give us your preferred telephone number if different to the number already provided.

error.invalid: You have entered an invalid phone number. Check it and enter it again

requested.label: Video (you'll need access to a computer or mobile device with a good internet speed and somewhere quiet and private to speak). Please give us your preferred email address if different to the email already provided.

error.invalid: You have entered an invalid email address. Check it and enter it again

requested.label: Face to face (you'll need to travel to the hearing in person).
